column2: "I figured it was about time you came to realize."
"For the time when you would try to change history of your own accord."
"The fact that you're here means you already know me."
"As for this body, I must apologize. I took the liberty of borrowing your Support Partner."
"I don't imagine you would agree to this, given the choice, but allow me to use it this time."
"Right now, Maria and Sara are moving accordingly, so the only one who can help you navigate is me."
"All right, let's proceed, all I can do is show you the way."
"The one who can open the path is you and you alone..."
"第７章 笑顔の再会のために"
